trans-unit.source: The ChartAreaCollection class represents a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> objects, which in turn represent the chart areas that are displayed within the chart image.
trans-unit.target: A ChartAreaCollection osztály számoknak <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objektumokat, amely viszont határoz meg, amely a diagram képének belül megjelennek a diagramterülethez.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A> property of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály van közzétéve, mint a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>tulajdonság a legfelső szintű <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.ChartAreas%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection.Count> property indicates the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection.Count>tulajdonság azt jelzi, a gyűjtemény elemeinek száma, és gyakran használt a gyűjtemény felső határa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartAreaCollection.Count>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object with the specified name to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Hozzáad egy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektum a megadott névvel, a gyűjteményhez.

trans-unit.source: Objects are always added as the last item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Objektumok mindig hozzá szeretné adni az utolsó elem a gyűjteményben.

trans-unit.source: The `name` argument specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> property of the object being added.
The name of the object to be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A gyűjteménybe felvenni kívánt objektum neve.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents a reference to the newly added object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> szám, amely egy újonnan hozzáadott objektum hivatkozását.
